channel.title: Website on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration
channel.description: Recent content in Website on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration

item.title: Beyond PLM
item.description: A blog, by Oleg Shilovitsky, for the community of people looking for information about Engineering and Manufacturing Software. This has much information relevant for the OSLC community. Visit

item.title: Pardon our dust: updated design rolling out gradually
item.description: As I mentioned almost a year ago, I’ve been plugging away at a new look and feel for this site. I have a project on GitHub; you can open issues or discuss the direction in general; you can look at proposed sample pages. And as of today, you’ll be able to see how it looks live. I’ll be rolling out elements of it gradually. There are a number of moving parts and I want to test thoroughly.

item.title: Pardon our dust: updated design rolling out gradually
item.description: As I mentioned almost a year ago, I’ve been plugging away at a new look and feel for this site. I have a project on GitHub; you can open issues or discuss the direction in general; you can look at proposed sample pages. And as of today, you’ll be able to see how it looks live. I’ll be rolling out elements of it gradually. There are a number of moving parts and I want to test thoroughly.
